oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lt. Col. Frank E. Adkins speaks to employees of B. F. Goodrich
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Col. Frank E. Adkins speaks to employees of B. F. Goodrich at the Army-Navy "E" Award presentation at the B. F. Goodrich plant. Frank Adkins spoke at the program. The B. F. Goodrich plant in Clarksville was awarded the "E" Award a total of 5 times during World War II.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adkins, Frank E., 1914-1945; World War, 1939-1945; United States. Army. Air Corps; B.F. Goodrich Company; Crowds
